business.headline: Tesla likely to set up shop in India, may invest $3-5 billion: Sources During their visit, Tesla executives are expected to hold meetings with officials from the Prime Minister's Office (PMO) and other key ministries.
Small SIP, big returns: Check how Rs 250 a month can grow to Rs 17 lakhSBI Mutual Fund's new JanNivesh SIP is making investing more accessible, letting anyone start with as little as Rs 250 a month.

Reliance is India's most valuable company. Check top 10 firms in Hurun India 500The 2024 Burgundy Private Hurun India 500 report values Reliance at Rs 17.5 lakh crore. TCS comes in second at Rs 16.1 lakh crore, and HDFC Bank takes third place with Rs 14.2 lakh crore.

Dr Reddy's, Aurobindo Pharma: Why pharma stocks fell in early trade today?The Nifty Pharma index dropped as much as 2% in early trade. Sun Pharma fell nearly 2%, Dr Reddy's dropped as much as 4%, and Aurobindo Pharma sank almost 6%. Cipla shares also fell.

Tata Motors shares get boost after CLSA upgrade. Check target priceTata Motors share price: At around 11:04 am, shares of Tata Motors were trading 0.34% higher at Rs 683.90 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE). It was up over 1% in early trade.

Hexaware Technologies shares debut at 5% premium over IPO priceHexaware Technologies IPO listing: The listing was largely in line with expectations, as the grey market premium (GMP) had disappeared ahead of the debut, indicating weak demand.
Sensex, Nifty open lower as IT, pharma stocks drag marketsThe S&P BSE Sensex shed 291.20 points to 75,676.19, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 88.65 points to 22,856.65 as of 9:25 AM.

Quality Power IPO: Check allotment status, latest GMP and listing date Quality Power IPO allotment status: Investors who applied for the Quality Power IPO can check their allotment status through the BSE website or the registrar's website (Link Intime India Private Ltd).

Elon Musk's Tesla hunts for land in India, Maharashtra leads: ReportWhile Maharashtra is leading the race, other states are also vying for the project. Tesla's plans could change depending on the incentives offered by different states.

Unified Pension Scheme to roll out from April 1. Check eligibility and benefitsUnder the new pension scheme, government employees will contribute 10% of their basic salary along with DA, while the government's contribution will rise from the previous 14% to 18.5%.

ELSS explained: Check tax benefits under Section 80C and other key details ELSS offers market-linked returns and has the potential to generate higher long-term returns as compared to other Section 80C options, including PPF, ULIPS, and NPS, etc.

Trump's reciprocal tariffs could hurt Indian exports. Which sectors are at risk?While officials are still waiting for details on how these tariffs will be calculated, they are already preparing countermeasures and working on a trade deal proposal to reduce tariffs and boost two-way trade.

entertainment.headline: Suzhal 2 trailer: Kathir takes on gripping murder mystery with Aishwarya RajeshThe official trailer of the highly-anticipated second season of the Tamil crime thriller Suzhal - The Vortex was released on Wednesday. Starring Kathir and Aishwarya Rajesh in lead roles, the series will premiere on Prime Video on February 28.

Rihanna 'thankful, humbled' after A$AP Rocky found not guilty in shooting caseA$AP Rocky was declared not guilty in a felony assault trial, leading to an emotional embrace with Rihanna in court. After the verdict, the singer issued her first statement, expressing relief.

Retro hits to soulful music: Magical evening at Papon's Valentine's Day special showPapon's concert in Delhi, hosted by TV9, was an unforgettable night filled with soulful music. Held at Major Dhyan Chand National Stadium, the event was part of the World Travel and Tourism Festival.

Watch: Arijit Singh attends father's video call during live concertArijit Singh's live concert in Chandigarh was made memorable by a surprise video call from his father during his performance. The singer shared heartfelt moments from the event on Instagram, expressing gratitude to his fans.

Pics: Singer Anuv Jain married, shares photos with wifeSinger Anuv Jain, popular for songs like Baarishein, is now married. He shared photos from the wedding and pre-wedding festivities on social media.

Singer Akhil Sachdeva on Diljit Dosanjh's infrastructure remark: I feel it's amazingSinger Akhil Sachdeva discusses the rise of concerts in India, film vs indie music, ticket prices, and Diljit Dosanjh's comments on concert infrastructure. He also stresses the importance of crediting technicians.

K-slate 2025: When Life Gives You Tangerine to Wife of a 21st Century PrinceKakao Entertainment is set to make 2025 a landmark year for K-dramas and films, with a rich array of releases across various genres. From gripping thrillers to heartwarming romances, the lineup promises stellar performances and captivating stories.

Dabba Cartel trailer: Shabana Azmi, Jyotika promise an addictive showThe trailer for Netflix's Dabba Cartel unveils a gripping crime drama about five women whose dabba business unexpectedly plunges them into the dangerous world of a drug cartel.

Kim Sae-ron's father blames YouTuber for death, co-star Won Bin breaks downSouth Korean actor Kim Sae-ron's father spoke out at her funeral, held a day after her death, highlighting the emotional distress she suffered due to a YouTuber's videos.

Karan Singh Grover back on TV 5 years after Kasautii Zindagii Kay: ReportActor Karan Singh Grover might just be a part of a romantic show very soon. He is reported to be seen alongside Helly Shah in this new TV show.

Late Linkin Park singer Chester Bennington's child comes out as transgenderLinkin Park singer Chester Bennington's child, Draven, has come out as transgender. The artiste shared the news on her social media handle, while stating her preferred pronouns in a small note.

Amit Trivedi: Global artists performing in India is nothing but pure businessIndia has become a hotspot for global artists to perform, drawing big names like Coldplay, Ed Sheeran, and Dua Lipa. Music composer Amit Trivedi believes their choice is driven by business interests, as they seek lucrative opportunities in the country.

Bridgerton 4 first look: Benedict-Sophie's love story takes centre stageThe fourth season of Bridgerton is set to spotlight Benedict Bridgerton's romance with Sophie Baek. New characters like Katie Leung's Lady Araminta Gun will add intrigue to the season.

Legends of Shiva: Amish Tripathi gets real about Lord Shiva in his latest showAuthor and producer Amish Tripathi returns as host of Legends of Shiva with Amish, a new show on Discovery Channel, exploring Lord Shiva beyond myths. Unveiled at the New Delhi Book Fair, it promises a deep dive into mythology coinciding with Maha Kumbh 2025.

Amortage review: Jisoo's album shakes things up like an 'earthquake'Jisoo's new EP, Amortage, released on February 14, 2025, marks her evolution as a solo artist. The EP blends pop and R&B to explore love's many facets, featuring English tracks and her own songwriting.

Bhabiji writer Manoj Santoshi battles cancer, Shilpa Shinde takes care of himActor Kavita Kaushik made an emotional post on social media, highlighting screenwriter Manoj Santoshi's struggle with liver cancer. She also mentioned actor Shilpa Shinde and thanked her for taking care of him.

The Witch review: Jinyoung, Jeong-eui shine in slow-burning psychological mysteryReleased-Sat Feb 15, 2025The Witch review: The Witch, a new K-drama starring Jinyoung and Jeong-eui, captivates with its psychological mystery and slow-burning narrative. The series, based on a popular webtoon, blends mystery, romance, and suspense, leaving viewers intrigued by the enigmatic characters and their complex interactions, says our review.

Rashami Desai on love-hate bond with Sidharth Shukla: We'd communicate through eyesActor Rashami Desai, who had worked with the late Sidharth Shukla on 'Dil Se Dil Tak' and 'Bigg Boss 13', was reminded of her relationship with him on comedian Bharti Singh's podcast.

Stray Kids' Felix suffers fracture after car accident, misses group's fan meetFelix, a member of the boy band Stray Kids, suffered an arm fracture in a minor car accident, causing him to miss the band's fifth fan meeting.

South Korean actor Kim Sae-ron wanted to make a comeback to films, open a cafeSouth Korean actor Kim Sae-ron, who was found dead in her apartment on Sunday, had wished to make a comeback to the entertainment world, revealed a friend recently.

Gajraj Rao, Renuka Shahane's Dupahiya to bring laughter and chaos to Prime VideoPrime Video's Dupahiya is set in a crime-free village where the first-ever theft of a motorbike creates chaos and drama. Starring Gajraj Rao and Renuka Shahane, the comedy series starts streaming on March 7.

South Korean actor Kim Sae-ron, 24, found deadSouth Korean actor Kim Sae-ron, known for her roles in Bloodhounds and The Man from Nowhere, was found dead at her home in Seoul. She was 24. Authorities are investigating the circumstances of her death, with no signs of foul play reported yet.

The White Lotus S3 review: Predictable? Yes. Addictive? Also, yesReleased-Mon Feb 17, 2025The White Lotus Season 3 review: The White Lotus returns with a new season set in Thailand, offering a fresh cultural backdrop while retaining its biting satire on the ultra-rich. The series continues to entertain with its dark humour and ensemble cast, though its formula is starting to feel familiar. Read our full review.

Kanye West says he fought 5 hours for Grammy tickets amid guest list confusionRapper Kanye West, in a post on X, revealed that he fought for five hours to secure Grammy tickets amid guest list chaos. This comes amid claims that Kanye arrived at the event uninvited.

Comedian Anubhav Bassi's Lucknow show cancelled after warning over foul languageThe shows of comedian Anubhav Singh Bassi in Lucknow were cancelled due to concerns over inappropriate content, following a complaint by the UP Women's Commission vice-chairperson. Authorities cited potential law and order issues as reasons for the cancellation.

Watch: Chum Darang blushes as Karan Veer confesses love on Valentine's DayKaran Veer Mehra confessed his love for Chum Darang on Valentine's Day. Chum shared a post from their romantic outing on social media.
Watch: Ed Sheeran pauses Delhi concert as fan faints, wears Team India jerseyEd Sheeran wrapped up his India tour in Gurugram on February 15. He paused his concert briefly to help a fan who fainted.

Shalin Bhanot reacts to India's Got Latent Row, advocates self-disciplineTV actor Shalin Bhanot has reacted to the controversy surrounding YouTuber Ranveer Allahbadia's comment on India's Got Latent during the FDCI's India Men's Weekend in Jaipur. He emphasised self-discipline and responsibility.

Today is a victory: Jay-Z reacts after rape lawsuit against him droppedIn a significant legal victory, rapper Jay-Z has seen a sexual assault lawsuit against him dismissed. The rapper and entrepreneur expressed relief and satisfaction over the court's decision.

No one can save him: Mahabharat actor threatens Ranveer Allahbadia Actor Saurav Gurjar openly threatened Ranveer Allahbadia over his recent remarks on India's Got Latent. In a video message, the actor requested the government to take strict action against the podcaster.

Drake releases new album amid feud with Kendrick Lamar, fails to impress fansDrake appears to have ended his feud with Kendrick Lamar in his latest album, but fans remain unimpressed. Released on Valentine's Day, the album in collaboration with PartyNextDoor marks his first new work since the Super Bowl halftime show.

Bharti Singh supports Samay Raina amid India's Got Latent controversyComedian Bharti Singh supported Samay Raina amid the India's Got Latent controversy. The comedian praised Samay and said that he is very sweet, and anyone can become his fan once they get to meet him.

Women's panel summons Elvish Yadav over remarks against Chum Darang on Feb 17YouTuber Elvish Yadav has been summoned by a women's panel following his racist remarks against Chum Darang. Yadav criticised her name and nationality, sparking courage among northeastern citizens.

Apoorva Mukhija aka Rebel Kid removed from official IIFA ambassador listApoorva Mukhija, known as Rebel Kid, has been removed from the IIFA ambassador list following controversy over her appearance in Samay Raina's show, India's Got Latent. The decision follows threats from Karni Sena to disrupt her upcoming shoot.

Fighting zombies to playing a psychopath: The many faces of Choi Woo-shikLong before Choi Woo-shik became a household name thanks to Parasite, he had already amassed an impressive filmography. On this week's K-Fix, we'll have a closer look at his notable works, crafted long before his Oscar-winning turn in Parasite.

The Potato Lab trailer: Kang Tae-oh is set to headline upcoming rom-comThe trailer for The Potato Lab, a romantic comedy-drama starring Kang Tae-oh and Lee Sun-bin, has been released. The series, set in a rural potato research institute, promises a blend of romance, comedy, and workplace drama.

Dhoom Dhaam review: Romance meets thrill in this Yami Gautam-Pratik Gandhi filmReleased-Fri Feb 14, 2025Dhoom Dhaam movie review: Dhoom Dhaam blends romance with action and comedy, offering a refreshing alternative to traditional Valentine's Day films. Starring Yami Gautam and Pratik Gandhi, the movie delivers a thrilling and entertaining experience perfect for a cosy night in.

Scared of Loving You: Selena Gomez's new song for her Valentine Benny Blanco out Lovebirds Selena Gomez and Benny Blanco have now collaborated for a new album titled I Said I Love You First. On the occasion of Valentine's Day 2025, Selena released the first single from the album, Scared of Loving You.

Ilaiyaraaja appears in Court in dispute with music company over his compositionsIn 2010, Music Master filed a lawsuit seeking a ban on the use of these songs on YouTube and social media platforms, calling it "unauthorised".

Are K-Drama men written by women too good to be true? | Valentine Special K-drama male leads have captivated audiences with their idealised traits, offering a romantic fantasy of the perfect partner. These characters, crafted by female screenwriters, challenge traditional portrayals. This Valentine's Day we analyse if they are too good to be true.

general news.headline: Tesla likely to set up shop in India, may invest $3-5 billion: Sources During their visit, Tesla executives are expected to hold meetings with officials from the Prime Minister's Office (PMO) and other key ministries.

BJP yet to announce Delhi Chief Minister, tomorrow's oath invite already outThe BJP that won in Delhi after 27 years, is set to end the suspense over the new Chief Minister today when it announces the name in its legislative party meeting.

If India spent $21 million on US poll turnout...: Fox News flags double standardsFox News flagged the US's double standards over its definition of 'election interference' amid a raging debate over Trump's decision to cancel $21 million for 'voter turnout' in India.

Not asking for your father's money: Udhayanidhi to Centre on withheld fundsTamil Nadu Deputy Chief Minister Udhayanidhi Stalin accused the BJP-led central government of withholding education funds and attempting to impose Hindi on the state. He also urged rival parties to join the fight for Tamil Nadu's two-language policy.
Took the dip at Maha Kumbh? Photos of you bathing could be for sale on Telegram If you're a woman at the Maha Kumbh taking the holy dip, be careful. Someone may be recording it and selling it online.

Getting hair tested: OpenAI whistleblower Suchir Joshi's kin junk autopsy reportThe family of OpenAI's former researcher and whistleblower, Suchir Balaji, has rejected the San Francisco County Medical Examiner's final autopsy report, which concluded that he died by suicide and wasn't murdered. Balaji's mother, Poornima Ramarao, dismissed the findings, revealing that the family had sent a hair sample from the apartment for further testing.

I've lot of respect for PM, but why are we giving $21 million to India? TrumpEarlier this week, the Elon Musk-led Department of Government Efficiency announced that it had slashed $723 million in foreign aid funding, including a $21 million grant for India aimed at increasing "voter turnout".

US regulator seeks Law Ministry's help in Adani bribery case, shows court filingGautam Adani bribery case: The US Securities and Exchange Commission has requested the Indian government's assistance in its probe of industrialist Gautam Adani and his nephew in connection with the USD 265 million bribery case, according to a court filing.

Ramdev races with horse to promote Shilajit, Bryan Johnson reacts, gets blocked'Age-reversing' CEO Bryan Johnson claimed yoga guru Ramdev blocked him from X after he replied to his post with a comment in disagreement.

Trump scolds Zelenskyy for complaining about US-Russia talks without UkraineUS President Donald Trump blamed his Ukrainian counterpart Voldodymyr Zelenskyy for "starting" the war in his country and said he should have ended it through a deal with Russia nearly three years ago.

Rarest of rare: Kolkata man gets death sentence for raping 7-month-old girlDeclaring the crime as "the rarest of rare," a special court in Kolkata sentenced Rajiv Ghosh to death for the brutal rape of a seven-month-old girl and ordered compensation of Rs 10 lakh to the victim's family.

US advertises 'cuffs and shackles' treatment for illegal immigrants in videoThe US posted a video showing illegal immigrants in shackles as they prepare them to board a deportation flight in America. The deportation of illegal immigrants comes as part of a sweeping crackdown by President Donald Trump on illegal immigration.

How big a health hazard is Sangam water with high level of faecal coliformThe National Green Tribunal has raised concerns over high faecal coliform bacteria levels in water near Sangam in Prayagraj. A report by the Central Pollution Control Board indicated high levels of faecal coliform amid the Maha Kumbh. What are the health risks associated with high levels of faecal bacteria in water?

How Vicky Kaushal became Chhaava: Sword training, horse riding and daily scarsVicky Kaushal trained for six months for Chhaava, enduring 6–8 hours of daily prep, including sword fighting and horse riding. The historical drama has crossed Rs 165 crore in five days at the box office.

Why H-1B visa for Indians costs anywhere between 1.7 and 6 lakhs?For Indian professionals dreaming of working in the US, the H-1B visa is the favourite of visas. The H-1B visa involves a lottery system and can cost up to Rs 6.1 lakh. Here's a breakdown of the expense and how much an H-1B visa might cost for an employer and applicant.

Is the Champions Trophy still relevant in the age of T20 cricket dominance?The Champions Trophy returns to the cricket calendar after an eight-year hiatus. Despite the dominance of T20 cricket, ODI cricket still holds significance through marquee tournaments like the Champions Trophy and World Cup. Multi-nation events could be key to reviving its relevance in a crowded cricketing calendar.

Listen up, ladies. Doctors don't want you to ignore these health signs, symptomsDoctors say women tend to ignore a lot of signs and symptoms indicating serious health risks. Here is a comprehensive guide to recognising them.

Trump wanted 'somebody smarter' than Elon Musk to head DOGE, 'settled on him'Donald Trump made the remarks during his first joint TV interview with Elon Musk since returning to the White House in January.

Bengaluru man wins case against PVR-INOX for wasting time with 25-min adsA consumer court in Bengaluru ruled in favour of a man who sued PVR Cinemas and INOX for wasting his time with long commercial advertisements. The court also directed the multiplex chain to specify actual movie start times on tickets.

S Jaishankar to attend Foreign Ministers' Meet in South Africa: What's on agenda?The Foreign Ministers' Meeting will focus on key global challenges, including economic recovery, geopolitical tensions, climate action, and sustainable development.

How Diya Kumari's lunch became a talking point on Rajasthan Budget'Green' and 'clean' buzzed as the deputy CM cum finance minister offered broad indicators about her first full-fledged Budget, to be presented on February 19

Elon Musk's Tesla hunts for land in India, Maharashtra leads: ReportWhile Maharashtra is leading the race, other states are also vying for the project. Tesla's plans could change depending on the incentives offered by different states.

Watch: US rapper hugs Rihanna after 'not guilty' verdict in assault caseAfter a three-week trial, the jury deliberated for just three hours to reach the verdict that spared Rocky, whose legal name is Rakim Mayers, a prison sentence that could have run more than two decades.

Gurugram woman warns of 'predators posing as brokers', shares horrifying experience In a post titled "Girls in Gurugram - Be aware of potential predators posing as brokers," the Reddit user recounted her horrifying experience that left her feeling alarmed and grateful for not being alone at the time.

Jr NTR and Prashanth Neel's NTR 31 to go on floors this month: ReportAfter years of anticipation, NTR 31 is reportedly set to go on floors on February 20. The first schedule will be brief, lasting a week to ten days, with Jr NTR joining in March.

New posters of Rishab Shetty's Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj unveiledThe second poster of The Pride of Bharat: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj, starring Rishab Shetty, was unveiled on the 395th birth anniversary of the Maratha warrior king. Directed by Sandeep Singh, the movie promises to bring Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj's legacy to life with an award-winning team.

Vishnu Manchu reveals Mohanlal, Prabhas's fee for cameos in KannappaVishnu Manchu's mythological pan-Indian film Kannappa is scheduled to release in theatres on April 25, 2025. During an interview, the actor opened up about the star-studded cameos in the film and revealed Prabhas and Mohanlal's remunerations.

Loveyapa writer Sneha Desai on film's box office failure: Might find audience on OTTSneha Desai, who wrote Junaid Khan's 'Loveyapa' talked about the film's dull reception at the box office in an exclusive interview with India Today Digital. She also mentioned how it's highly likely for the audience to be totally surprised by the film's story once it releases online.

sports.headline: ICC ODI Rankings: Shubman Gill overtakes Babar Azam to become No. 1 batterIndia batter Shubman Gill overtook Babar Azam to become the world No.1 batter in the ICC ODI rankings. Shubman became the top ranked batter after a sensational 3-match series against England.

Watch: Jack Whitehall trolls Mercedes boss Toto Wolff over Lewis HamiltonComedian Jack Whitehall decided to troll Mercedes boss Toto Wolff because of Lewis Hamilton's move to Ferrari ahead of the new F1 2025 season. Hamilton spent 12 years with Mercedes before his move to Ferrari.

Australia's Matt Kuhnemann undergoes bowling action test, result next weekAustralia's Matt Kuhnemann has undergone the test by the ICC after being reported for a suspect bowling action during the tour of Sri Lanka. Kuhnemann underwent the test under the watchful eyes of ICC experts.

Pakistan vs New Zealand LIVE: Defending champions eye winning startPakistan vs New Zealand, Champions Trophy Live score: Co-hosts Pakistan will be hoping to kickstart their Champions Trophy campaign in a strong fashion, but their challenge comes against New Zealand, who have already defeated them in the recent Tri-series final.

Pakistan has no pressure: Babar Azam ahead of Champions Trophy opener vs NZChampions Trophy: Star batter Babar Azam has claimed that Pakistan are under no pressure ahead of their Champions Trophy opening match against New Zealand on Wednesday, February 19. Babar was part of Pakistan's Champions Trophy winning squad in 2017.

Arshdeep Singh over Harshit Rana to replace Jasprit Bumrah: Ricky PontingChampions Trophy: Ricky Ponting backed Arshdeep Singh over Harshit Rana as India's best replacement for injured Jasprit Bumrah in the Champions Trophy, citing Arshdeep's control and experience in white-ball cricket as key factors for India's bowling attack.

Multi-nation events could be key to reviving its relevance in a crowded cricketing calendar.

New Zealand has squad depth for Champions Trophy despite injuries: BondDespite injury setbacks, Shane Bond believes New Zealand's squad depth remains strong, emphasising their all-rounders' impact and confidence from recent triumphs ahead of the Champions Trophy opener against Pakistan in Karachi on February 19.

Fully fit Novak Djokovic handed shock Qatar Open exit by Matteo BerrettiniNovak Djokovic's struggles in 2025 continued as he suffered a shocking Round of 32 defeat to Matteo Berrettini at the Qatar Open. The Italian dominated after a tiebreak first set to claim a 7-6 (4), 6-2 win.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
Jawaharlal Nehru University: Brains trustTeaching and research go hand in hand at the institute which is proud of its activist tradition.
